archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.3.8a: a) avoid sharing, transferring, uploading, storing online or commenting on sensitive information in the public domain (e.g. using personal cloud storage or social media).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
